title: BPCL and Mumbai Port Authority to launch India's first green fuel ecosystem
description: BPCL partners with Mumbai Port Authority and Mumbai Port Sustainability Foundation to set up EV charging stations and convert diesel vessels to cleaner fuels, aiming for sustainable maritime operations. The collaboration includes waste management initiatives to enhance environmental responsibility and reduce the portâ€™s carbon footprint.
